tab1.text1:
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Discord</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Join the Discord using the 'join' link below or alternatively via</>
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">discord.gg/hyZPVAVSnn</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">First Time?</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Before diving in, please take a moment to familiarize yourself with our community rules and conduct. You can find our rules and settings on this UI, but for a more comprehensive set, please see our Discord.</>


<TextStyle.Yellow>ABOUT THIS SERVER</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">What is this place?</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">ODYSSEY offers our version of a balanced, long-term experience with slightly increased stats for rewarding gameplay without the excessive grind of official servers.  50x enjoyers - this isn't for you.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Mods</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">We've added some mods to further expand on the experience. We only introduce immersive mods that feel like they should belong in the game. You won't find OP gamebreaking mods here! These mods are reviewed constantly to ensure any mod author updates don't bring in anything we don't want around.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Community</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">We aim to foster a nice community of players who get along with each other, trade and otherwise thrive through collaboration.. or keep to yourself, it's your choice! Either way we want you to feel at home. We do not tolerate bad actors who cause excessive trouble, so you have been warned!</>
tab1.text3: <RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- No events announced to date</>

tab2.text1:
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- No griefing, trolling or harrassment towards strangers.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- No player-killing.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- No begging for dinos/armour/weapons/resources.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">- No Racism, sexism, homophobia or other discrimination.</>

<TextStyle.White>Evidence</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">We require evidence before we can act, preferrably video clips. These can be discreetly submitted via Discord.</>
